Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to creating a private right of action related to civil immigration detainers and cooperation with federal immigration authorities
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Creating a private right of action related to civil immigration detainers and cooperation with federal immigration authorities.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to signage describing certain constitutional and legal protections.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Signage describing certain constitutional and legal protections.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to restricting employers from using E-Verify or any other employment eligibility verification system to check the employment authorization status of an employee or an applicant who has not been offered employment
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Restricting employers from using E-Verify or any other employment eligibility verification system to check the employment authorization status of an employee or an applicant who has not been offered employment.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to redefining terms concerning immigration enforcement to account for current enforcement practices, and prohibiting the maintenance of an office or quarters on property under the jurisdiction of the department of correction by federal immigration authorities
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Redefining terms concerning immigration enforcement to account for current enforcement practices, and prohibiting the maintenance of an office or quarters on property under the jurisdiction of the DOC by federal immigration authorities.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Cabán and Won
